The complexity of this view is considered medium due to the following reasons:
It involves multiple table joins and aggregation functions.
It uses conditional logic to handle NULL values and specific filtering criteria.

Grouping is done on facility number, agency code, borough, block, and lot number.
The view is used to provide a consolidated view of facility and agency data for reporting or analysis purposes.
It helps in understanding the spatial and organizational attributes of facilities managed by different agencies.
Generating reports for facility management, including spatial distribution and agency assignments.
Analyzing facility utilization based on square footage and location attributes.
Supporting decision-making processes in urban planning or resource allocation.
The view involves multiple joins and aggregations, which can impact performance, especially with large datasets.
